attributes.action: Retain our freedom to move across 27+ nations regardless of the Brexit outcome.
attributes.additional_details:
There are other countries which enjoy membership of the Single Market whilst also not being members of European Union.

Our demand, therefore, is the retention of our right to live, love, travel, trade, work and retire across 27+ other nations without the need for visas or checks on our earnings and bank balances. The removal of this automatic right is an inherently elitist act and must not be supported by the Government of this country.
attributes.background:
We the undersigned demand that our automatic freedom to move across 27+ other nations is retained, whether or not we eventually leave the European Union.

Leaving the EU does not necessitate leaving the Single Market and need not involve the removal of the British population's Freedom of Movement.
